headline.main: CANADA'S CONTRACTS REACH $2,600,000,000; Howe Reports to Commons That Output Is Expanding

lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, Nov. 4 -- In the course of a detailed statement on Canada's arms and munitions production, which he gave to the House of Commons this evening, Munitions Minister C.D. Howe said contracts had been awarded for $2,600,000,000.
abstract: Min Howe repts on output, contracts, plants, shipbldg, aircraft, tanks and arms, Commons
